title: PromptLibraryEntry
description: Metadata contract for reusable prompt assets managed by the Everyday AI prompt library.

id.description: Unique catalog identifier following the XX-### convention. Use two-letter category codes (e.g., PL, RS, CD).

title.description: Human-friendly name for the prompt asset.

category.description: Primary thematic grouping for filtering and navigation (e.g., Planning, Research, Communication).

use_case.description: Primary workflow or business scenario the prompt supports.

prompt_type.description: Primary output format (e.g., Plan, Checklist, Generator, Summary).

last_review.description: Date the prompt was last validated against policy and success criteria.

risk_level.description: Risk tier based on data sensitivity and downstream impact.

difficulty.description: Skill maturity required to operate the prompt safely and effectively.

guardrails.description: Explicit constraints, disclaimers, or validations that must accompany the prompt.

inputs.description: Structured inputs or evidence the operator must provide before running the prompt.

outputs.description: Expected output artefacts (e.g., JSON schema name, deck section, email).

prompt.description: Finalised system or user prompt text with interpolation tokens.

tags.description: Searchable keywords for filtering the catalog.
